Text: Appendix D Time Error Correction Procedures for OC ballotTO NERC ROSTER STANDARDS LISTSERVER GROUP OPERATING MANUAL OWNERS SYSTEM OPERATOR TRAINERS Ladies and Gentlemen The Resources Subcommittee has posted Appendix D Time Error Correction Procedures Version for Operating Committee ballot The OC is will consider this Appendix at its July meeting Because this document is quite short I have attached it to this email note along with existing Version for reference These documents are also on the NERC web site at ocstandards Don Benjamin Appendix D Version PDF Appendix D Version PDF
